description: This tropical fruit cake recipe is packed with citrusy flavours with a little spicy kick from the ginger. Moist and light, this is best served with a hot cup of tea.
name: Tropical Fruit Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Decorate the cooled cake with the dried fruit or nuts and glaze with the apricot jelly.
